sources.name: InventarioEUROcsv
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InventarioEUROcsv

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared InventarioEUROcsv = let AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://eurocomp417d5b.blob.core.windows.net/testpython/inventario_eurocomp.csv"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]) in  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let 
    Source = #"InventarioEUROcsv",
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"cod_producto", "cod_proveedor", "cod_hacienda", "desc_corta", "presentacion", "colores", "familia_id", "clase", "modelo", "item_grupo_1", "item_grupo_2", "item_grupo_3", "image_url_2", "image_url_3", "image_url_4", "image_url_5", "caracteristicas", "itemref_1", "itemref_2", "itemref_3", "itemref_4", "itemref_5", "itemref_6", "itemref_7", "itemref_8", "itemref_9", "itemref_10", "itemref_11", "itemref_12", "itemref_13", "itemref_14", "privacidad", "peso", "medida", "equivalencia"}),
    #"Renamed Columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns 1",{{"codigo", "sku"}, {"descripcion", "name"}, {"familia", "collection"}, {"marca", "brand"}, {"precio", "price"}, {"stock", "inventory"}}),
    #"Added Custom" = Table.AddColumn( #"Renamed Columns", "fieldType", each "Product"),
    #"Added Custom1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom", "handleId", each "product_"&[sku]),
    #"Added Custom2" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom1", "description", each "Imágenes de referencia
 ¿Cómo comprar?
 1-Agrega al carrito en “COMPRAR”
 2-Registro: Completa tus datos y sigue los pasos
 3-Selecciona el método de entrega:"),
     #"Inserted Prefix" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom2", "Prefix", each "eurocompcr.com/" & [#"image_url"], type text),
  #"Inserted conditional column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted Prefix", "Custom", each if [Prefix] <> "eurocompcr.com/" then [Prefix] else ""),
  #"Removed columns 2" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Inserted conditional column", {"Prefix"}),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns 2", {{"Custom", "Prefix"}}),
    #"Inserted Prefix1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Renamed columns 1", "Prefix.1", each "eurocompcr.com/" & [#"image_url_1"], type text),
  #"Inserted conditional column 1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted Prefix1", "Custom", each if [Prefix.1] <> "eurocompcr.com/" then [Prefix.1] else ""),
  #"Removed columns 3" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Inserted conditional column 1", {"Prefix.1"}),
  #"Renamed columns 2" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns 3", {{"Custom", "Prefix.1"}}),
    #"Removed Columns1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Renamed columns 2",{"image_url","image_url_1"}),
    #"Merged Columns" = Table.CombineColumns(#"Removed Columns1",{"Prefix", "Prefix.1"},Combiner.CombineTextByDelimiter(";", QuoteStyle.None),"productImageUrl"),
    #"Replaced Value" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Merged Columns",";","",Replacer.ReplaceValue,{"productImageUrl"}),
  #"Replaced value 1" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Replaced Value", "jpg;", "jpg", Replacer.ReplaceText, {"productImageUrl"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Replaced value 1", {{"price", Currency.Type}}),
    #"Added Custom4" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed column type", "Custom.1", each [price]*600.0*1.2*1.13),
    #"Filtered Rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Added Custom4", each ([inventory] <> "1.000")),
    #"Removed Columns2" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered Rows",{"price"}),
    #"Renamed Columns1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed Columns2",{{"Custom.1", "price"}}),
    #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Renamed Columns1",{{"price", Currency.Type}}),
  #"Inserted rounding" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed Type", "Inserted rounding", each Number.Round([price]/1000, 2), Currency.Type),
  #"Inserted multiplication" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted rounding", "Multiplication", each [Inserted rounding] * 1000, Currency.Type),
  #"Filtered rows 1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Inserted multiplication", each [Multiplication] <> 0),

  #"Removed Columns3" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows 1",{"price", "Inserted rounding"}),
    #"Renamed Columns2" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed Columns3",{{"Multiplication", "price"}}),
    #"Changed Type1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Renamed Columns2",{{"inventory", Int64.Type}}),
    #"Added Conditional Column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed Type1", "Inventory1", each if [inventory] > 30 then 30 else [inventory]),
    #"Renamed Columns3" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Added Conditional Column",{{"inventory", "inventory3"}, {"Inventory1", "inventory"}}),
    #"Removed Columns4" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Renamed Columns3",{"inventory3"}),
    #"Added Custom5" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed Columns4", "ribbon", each ""),
    #"Added Custom6" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom5", "surcharge", each ""),
    #"Added Custom7" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom6", "visible", each "TRUE"),
    #"Added Custom8" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom7", "discountMode", each "PERCENT"),
    #"Added Custom9" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom8", "discountValue", each "0"),
    #"Added Custom10" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom9", "weight", each ""),
    #"Added Custom11" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom10", "cost", each ""),
    #"Added Custom12" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom11", "productOptionName1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom13" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom12", "productOptionType1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom14" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom13", "productOptionDescription1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom15" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom14", "productOptionName2", each ""),
    #"Added Custom16" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom15", "productOptionType2", each ""),
    #"Added Custom17" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom16", "productOptionDescription2", each ""),
    #"Added Custom18" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom17", "productOptionName3", each ""),
    #"Added Custom19" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom18", "productOptionType3", each ""),
    #"Added Custom20" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom19", "productOptionDescription3", each ""),
    #"Added Custom21" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom20", "productOptionName4", each ""),
    #"Added Custom22" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom21", "productOptionType4", each ""),
    #"Added Custom23" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom22", "productOptionDescription4", each ""),
    #"Added Custom24" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom23", "productOptionName5", each ""),
    #"Added Custom25" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom24", "productOptionType5", each ""),
    #"Added Custom26" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom25", "productOptionDescription5", each ""),
    #"Added Custom27" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom26", "productOptionName6", each ""),
    #"Added Custom28" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom27", "productOptionType6", each ""),
    #"Added Custom29" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom28", "productOptionDescription6", each ""),
    #"Added Custom30" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom29", "additionalInfoTitle1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom31" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom30", "additionalInfoDescription1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom32" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom31", "additionalInfoTitle2", each ""),
    #"Added Custom33" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom32", "additionalInfoDescription2", each ""),
    #"Added Custom34" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom33", "additionalInfoTitle3", each ""),
    #"Added Custom35" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom34", "additionalInfoDescription3", each ""),
    #"Added Custom36" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom35", "additionalInfoTitle4", each ""),
    #"Added Custom37" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom36", "additionalInfoDescription4", each ""),
    #"Added Custom38" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom37", "additionalInfoTitle5", each ""),
    #"Added Custom39" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom38", "additionalInfoDescription5", each ""),
    #"Added Custom40" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom39", "additionalInfoTitle6", each ""),
    #"Added Custom41" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom40", "additionalInfoDescription6", each ""),
    #"Added Custom42" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom41", "customTextField1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom43" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom42", "customTextCharLimit1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom44" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom43", "customTextMandatory1", each ""),
    #"Added Custom45" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom44", "customTextField2", each ""),
    #"Added Custom46" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom45", "customTextCharLimit2", each ""),
    #"Added Custom47" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom46", "customTextMandatory2", each ""),
    #"Reordered Columns7" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Added Custom47",{"handleId","fieldType","name","description","productImageUrl","collection","sku","ribbon","price","surcharge","visible","discountMode","discountValue","inventory","weight","cost","productOptionName1","productOptionType1","productOptionDescription1","productOptionName2","productOptionType2","productOptionDescription2","productOptionName3","productOptionType3","productOptionDescription3","productOptionName4","productOptionType4","productOptionDescription4","productOptionName5","productOptionType5","productOptionDescription5","productOptionName6","productOptionType6","productOptionDescription6","additionalInfoTitle1","additionalInfoDescription1","additionalInfoTitle2","additionalInfoDescription2","additionalInfoTitle3","additionalInfoDescription3","additionalInfoTitle4","additionalInfoDescription4","additionalInfoTitle5","additionalInfoDescription5","additionalInfoTitle6","additionalInfoDescription6","customTextField1","customTextCharLimit1","customTextMandatory1","customTextField2","customTextCharLimit2","customTextMandatory2","brand"}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Reordered Columns7", {{"visible", type text}})

in
#"Changed column type 1";
